event.title: March residents of remote villages began

data.event: Sometime during March residents of remote villages began illegally mining gold in areas of high lead concentration.

event.title: 111 of the 163 recorded deaths have been children, many only several years

data.event: According to Henry Akpan, chief epidemiologist at Nigeria's Ministry of Health, 111 of the 163 recorded deaths have been children, many only several years old.
